title: Bloomberg Markets: Bjerga on Transformation of American Diet
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bjerga on Transformation of American Diet
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Alan Bjerga\u0010Agricultural Reporter \u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing his story "If You Are What You Eat, America Tastes Like Chicken." Forty-five years of favorite foods reveal changes in U.S. diet.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
